candidates.title: Add string to datetime to str plugin
candidates.body: Added --to-date-time (-D) which takes a string with an appropriate date/time format and will convert it into an internal date type

candidates.title: Switch stdin redirect to manual. Add test
Do not panic when failing to decode lines from external stdout
candidates.body:
Part of an effort to reduce the number of panics, this will simply error with an informative message when we can't properly decode stdin. This only happens when an external's stdin doesn't put a newline at the end of the stream.

Related issue: https://github.com/nushell/nushell/issues/1355

candidates.title: Pipeline sink refactor
candidates.body:
This updates how we sink the pipeline and opens us up to some new features in the future:

* Moves where autoview is assumed out of `run_pipeline`. This means that `run_pipeline` will now output a stream that can be later consumed. In the future, this will allow blocks to hold a pipeline and evaluate it without viewing it.
* Adds a `-c` commandline flag to pass in a pipeline of commands via a string that is run to completions. Note: stdin redirection is not yet supported

candidates.title: Update more futures-preview to futures
candidates.body:
This updates more crates to use the more recent `futures` crate.

The only dependency left is `surf` that still uses futures-preview. They have an updated version in the repo that removes it, but nothing published to crates.io

candidates.title: Futures v0.3 upgrade
candidates.body:
This PR upgrades all of our dependencies from `futures-preview` to `futures@0.3`, and also removes some unneeded dependencies.

Because the update to `futures` from `0.3.0-alpha.19` to `0.3.0` removed the `Stream` implementation of `VecDeque` ([changelog]), most commands that convert a `VecDeque` to an `OutputStream` broke and had to be fixed. The current solution is to now convert `VecDeque`s to a `Stream` via `futures::stream::iter`. However, it may be useful for `futures` to create an `IntoStream` trait, implemented on the `std::collections` (or really any `IntoIterator`). If something like this happends, it may be worthwhile to update the trait implementations on `OutputStream` and refactor these commands again.

While upgrading `futures_codec`, we remove a custom implementation of `LinesCodec`, as one has been added to the library. There's also a small refactor to make the stream output more idiomatic.

The impact on dependency count isn't huge. `cargo check --all-features --all-targets` drops from 488 deps to 482. Still, we're now more up to date with the ecosystem.

[changelog]: https://github.com/rust-lang/futures-rs/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#030---2019-11-5

candidates.title: Add block size to du
candidates.body:
Resolves #1323

Added a block size column to the output of `du`

candidates.title: Opt-out unused heim features from sys/ps plugins.
